mapper.sql: ssp.RID, ssp.MAIN_RID, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.REPORT_TIME, ssp.OCCUR_TIME, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.EVENT_TYPE2, ssp.EVENT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.CC_URL, ssp.IP, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.URL, ssp.UNIT_INDUSTY, ssp.UNIT_NAME, ssp.MEMO, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.SNAPSHOP , ssp.LOG_RID, ssp.LOG_FILENAME, ssp.LOG_TABLENAME, ssp.PRIORITY, ssp.KEYWORDS, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME

ssp.RID, ssp.MAIN_RID, ssp.CLIENTNAME, ssp.REPORT_CITY, ssp.REPORT_TIME, ssp.OCCUR_TIME, ssp.EVENT_TYPE1, ssp.EVENT_TYPE2, ssp.EVENT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL, ssp.THREAT_NAME, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1, ssp.THREAT_TYPE2, ssp.THREAT_TYPE3, ssp.THREAT_TYPE4, ssp.ATTACK_IP, ssp.CC_DOMAIN, ssp.CC_URL, ssp.IP, ssp.DOMAIN_NAME, ssp.URL, ssp.UNIT_INDUSTY, ssp.UNIT_NAME, ssp.MEMO, ssp.ACCESS_ID, ssp.ROOM_NAME, ssp.ROOM_IDX, ssp.CREATTIME, ssp.MODIFIEDTIME, ssp.RECORDSTATE, ssp.RECTIFY_MEASURE, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIME, ssp.FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, ssp.SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM, ssp.CLOSE_TERM, ssp.SEND_TIME, ssp.SEND_TIMESTAMP, ssp.RECTIFY_STATE, ssp.EVENT_SOURCE, ssp.WEB_CASE_RID, ssp.MAPPING_MODE, ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE, ssp.FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, ssp.SNAPSHOP, ssp.LOG_RID, ssp.LOG_FILENAME, ssp.LOG_TABLENAME, ssp.IS_WHITE_LIST, ssp.PRIORITY, ssp.KEYWORDS, sii.IDC_ID, sii.IDC_NAME
mapper.select:
select sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID,ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as TRANS_WEB_CASE_RID,ssp.Rid as SNAPSHOP, case WHEN ssp.SNAPSHOP is not null and ssp.SNAPSHOP!='' then '详情' else '无' end as TRANS_SNAPSHOP, ,
CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.EVENT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.EVENT_TYPE2) as EVENT_ALL, CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as TYPE_ALL
ssp.EVENT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.EVENT_TYPE2 as EVENT_ALL, ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as TYPE_ALL
from smms_pending_event as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID
ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'
${whereCondition}
order by ${order}

SELECT sii.rid as siiRid, sii.IDC_NAME as idc_name, ssr.rid as ssrRid, ssr.ROOM_NAME as room_name, ssr.ROOM_IDX as room_idx, ssr.ROOM_ADDRESS as room_address FROM
smms_room_info as ssr left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssr.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID where ssr.ACCESS_ID=#{ACCESS_ID} and ssr.ROOM_IDX=#{ROOM_IDX} and ssr.RECORDSTATE='0'
select SNAPSHOP from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp where ssp.RID = #{RID}
mapper.delete: delete from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp where ssp.RID = #{RID}
mapper.select: select ,sii.IDC_NAME as TRANS_IDC_ID,ssw.WEBSITE_NAME as TRANS_WEB_CASE_RID from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID where ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'and ssp.RID = #{RID}

select ssp.url, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as damage_class, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as case_id, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as rectify_term, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as close_term, ssp.rid as event_id,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as security_type
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as security_type
from smms_pending_event as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid
ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'
${ridCondition}

select ssp.rid as event_id, ssp.url,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as security_type,
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as security_type,
ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as damage_class, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST as rectify_suggestion, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as rectify_term, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as case_id, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop from smms_pending_event as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid
ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0'
${ridCondition}

select ssp.rid as event_id, ssp.url,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as security_type,
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as security_type,
ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as damage_class, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST as rectify_suggestion, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as rectify_term, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as case_id, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop from smms_pending_event as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='2' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' order by ssp.access_id asc

select ssp.url, ssp.SNAPSHOP as snapshop, ssp.ACCESS_ID as access_id, ssp.THREAT_LEVEL as damage_class, swc.SPONSER_CASE_NUM as case_id, ssp.RECTIFY_TERM as rectify_term, ssp.CLOSE_TERM as close_term, ssp.rid as event_id,
CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(CONCAT(ssp.THREAT_TYPE1,'_'),ssp.THREAT_TYPE2),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE3),'_',ssp.THREAT_TYPE4) as security_type
ssp.THREAT_TYPE1 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE2 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE3 || '_' || ssp.THREAT_TYPE4 as security_type
from smms_pending_event as ssp left JOIN smms_web_case as swc on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=swc.rid where ssp.RECTIFY_STATE='000' and ssp.IS_FORCE_CLOSE='1' and ssp.RECORDSTATE='0' order by ssp.access_id asc
mapper.update: update SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp set ssp.RECORDSTATE=#{RECORDSTATE} where ssp.RID=#{RID}
mapper.select: select from SMMS_PENDING_EVENT as ssp left join smms_idc_info as sii on ssp.ACCESS_ID=sii.IDC_ID left join SMMS_WEB_CASE as ssw on ssp.WEB_CASE_RID=ssw.RID where ssp.RID = #{RID}
mapper.insert:
insert into SMMS_PENDING_EVENT (
MAIN_RID, CLIENTNAME, REPORT_CITY, REPORT_TIME, OCCUR_TIME, EVENT_TYPE1, EVENT_TYPE2, EVENT_TYPE3, THREAT_LEVEL, THREAT_NAME, THREAT_TYPE1, THREAT_TYPE2, THREAT_TYPE3, THREAT_TYPE4, ATTACK_IP, CC_DOMAIN, CC_URL, IP, DOMAIN_NAME,
KEYWORDS, UNIT_INDUSTY, UNIT_NAME, MEMO, ACCESS_ID, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_IDX, CREATTIME, MODIFIEDTIME, RECORDSTATE, RECTIFY_MEASURE, FEEDBACK_TIME, FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP, SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST, RECTIFY_TERM, CLOSE_TERM, SEND_TIME, SEND_TIMESTAMP, RECTIFY_STATE, EVENT_SOURCE, WEB_CASE_RID, MAPPING_MODE, IS_FORCE_CLOSE, IS_WHITE_LIST, SNAPSHOP, LOG_RID, LOG_FILENAME, LOG_TABLENAME, FORCE_CLOSE_DESC, URL, RID ) values (
#{MAIN_RID}, #{CLIENTNAME}, #{REPORT_CITY}, #{REPORT_TIME}, #{OCCUR_TIME}, #{EVENT_TYPE1}, #{EVENT_TYPE2}, #{EVENT_TYPE3}, #{THREAT_LEVEL},1, #{THREAT_NAME},999, #{THREAT_TYPE1},999, #{THREAT_TYPE2}, #{THREAT_TYPE3}, #{THREAT_TYPE4}, #{ATTACK_IP}, #{CC_DOMAIN}, #{CC_URL}, #{IP}, #{DOMAIN_NAME},
#{KEYWORDS}, #{UNIT_INDUSTY}, #{UNIT_NAME}, #{MEMO}, #{ACCESS_ID}, #{ROOM_NAME}, #{ROOM_IDX}, #{CREATTIME}, #{MODIFIEDTIME}, #{RECORDSTATE}, #{RECTIFY_MEASURE}, #{FEEDBACK_TIME}, #{FEEDBACK_TIMESTAMP}, #{SYS_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{FINAL_RECTIFY_SUGGEST}, #{RECTIFY_TERM}, #{CLOSE_TERM}, #{SEND_TIME}, #{SEND_TIMESTAMP}, #{RECTIFY_STATE}, #{EVENT_SOURCE}, #{WEB_CASE_RID}, #{MAPPING_MODE}, #{IS_FORCE_CLOSE},2,
#{IS_WHITE_LIST},2, #{SNAPSHOP}, #{LOG_RID}, #{LOG_FILENAME}, #{LOG_TABLENAME}, #{FORCE_CLOSE_DESC}, #{URL}, #{RID} )
mapper.update: update SMMS_PENDING_EVENT set IS_WHITE_LIST='1' where RID=#{RID}
